name: 0 - Outro
_source: speak;Caroline; Don't celebrate yet.{w} We killed all the demons, but they'll come back if we're not careful.{w} We'd best burn the bodies quickly.
speak;Emma; No, mother{tgm}...{tgm} I want to have a proper burial for these townsfolk.{w} It's the best way to make sure their souls pass on in peace.
speak;Caroline; If you say so, Emma{tgm}...{tgm} I'll leave you in charge of that.
speak;Caroline; So, you're the Dawn Brigade I've heard so much about from Sarah?
speak;Carlos; Yes we are. I'm Carlos, their tactician.{w} Kate is the leader and Luna is her younger sister.{w} Kate may be our leader, but{tgm}...
speak;Carlos; I consider myself a free thinker and take my own action from time to time.
speak;Kate; Since you're such a free thinker, Carlos,{w} perhaps you can think about this little <bconvo>TALK</> I want to have with you!
speak;Carlos; Yes we are. I'm Carlos, their tactician who-
speak;Kate; Our tactician who cowered inside a house,{w} while leaving the rest of us to fight for our lives and sending my sister to battle?
speak;Carlos; Well, erm, there was no reason for me to jump in while you had it handled.
speak;Kate; Well then, Carlos, perhaps you can handle this little <bconvo>TALK</> I want to have with you!
speak;Kate; Caroline, Sarah, follow us.{w} You wanted a meeting, so here it is.
speak;Sarah; Ah, I need a moment.
speak;Kate; Fine by me.{w} Gives me more time to have a <red>gentle</> chat with Carlos.
speak;Emma; Guessing that poor guy is going to get an earful now.{w} So what's next, Sarah?

speak;Sarah; Your mother and I are going to negotiate with Kate to combine our two factions together.{w} Since their numbers were severely diminished, I think it'll be easier to sway her over.{w} The only contentious point might be the topic of leadership,{w} but I'm sure we'll work something out.
speak;Emma; Let me know how that goes. I'll wait for you over here.
speak;Sarah; You're not going to join us in the meeting?{w} Usually a leader's right hand would join them in all their important meetings.
speak;Emma; I just need some time to think.{w} Plus, I don't believe you'll need a second if my mother is already in the room arguing.
speak;Emma; So where do we go from here if Kate agrees to join us?
speak;Sarah; Well{tgm}...{tgm}I heard whispers of another merc group overseas rising in power{w}, so we could take a boat and meet them there.
speak;Emma; I wonder when we'll finally have enough people to fight back the invaders of our homeland{tgm}...
speak;Sarah; Stay strong, Emma.{w} Since everyone here is dead and none of us know how to man a vessel,{w} we'll have to go to another town to get people to help us set sail.
speak;Emma; So we can get our fliers to scout other villages to find people that can help us?
speak;Sarah; Indeed.{w} This boat still looks perfectly operational, I think,{w} so we can take it to sail to Umbra territory,{w} and we can meet the mercenaries in Rosefall.
speak;Kate; Carlos, would you like to explain yourself?
speak;Kate; You let Luna into battle when I <bconvo>specificallly</> said not to!

speak;Carlos; Listen, Kate.{w} Luna may be your younger sister, but you've got to stop stifling her.{w} She took flying lessons to fight with you, not to get sidelined.{w} It's time you let her grow up and have Luna really fight!{w} You've seen her in combat, Kate. She's ready.

speak;Kate; She fought well, I can say that much, but I'm her older sister.{w} I'm responsible for her, and I have to protect her{tgm}...{tgm}{w} If that means she's going to sit out so I I don't repeat our village's destruction,{w} then that's what's going to happen!
speak;Luna; That's what this is about?
speak;Luna; You just don't think I can handle myself?{w} I'm not defenseless anymore!{w} We can protect each other out there.
speak;Kate; Luna{tgm}...{tgm}I{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I just can't bear to see that face you madde back then again{tgm}...{tgm}{w} The face of anger and vengeance{tgm}...
speak;Kate; She doesn't have to follow my footsteps on the path to murder...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk

speak;Carlos; Kate, you've got to trust us.{w} Remember, we're a team, and we'll always hold each other up.{w} Nobody faces the darkness alone.{w} Luna and I have talked about all her emotions connected to your family.{w} Your family will be avenged, but we'll do it together.
speak;Luna; Yeah!{w} You're not the only one who can hold her own out there!{w} Together on and off the field!
speak;Kate; Oh Luna{tgm}...{tgm}{w} idd you really grow up this much while I had my back turned{tgm}...{tgm}?{w} I'm so glad to have you with me{tgm}...
speak;Carlos; And I as well, right?
speak;Kate; Oh relax, I'm just teasting him.{w} We need all the levity we can get.
speak;Luna; You're not very goodd at jokes, though. Your humor is a bit dry.
speak;Kate; My humor is plenty rich!
speak;Luna; I on't think so.{w} I'm pretty sure neither Carlos nor I have ever even laughed at your jokes.
speak;Kate; Nuh uh! You must've laughed at some point.
speak;Carlos; So this is Kate's fabled soft side...{w} Gotta say, she's much more childdish when she's not busy playing commander.;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Carlos; Hahaha! Well, it looks like you guys made up!{w} Kate, I take it this means I can make plans for Luna to join us in battle?
